TitlePart.Title: To work with plant machinery like excavators or dumper trucks, you'll need to be 18 or over and have a driving licence.

Description.Html: To work with plant machinery like excavators or dumper trucks, you'll need to be 18 or over and have a driving licence.

data.DisplayText: To work with plant machinery like excavators or dumper trucks, you'll need to be 18 or over and have a driving licence.
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: Many airlines also ask that you're able to swim up to 25 metres.

Description.Html: Many airlines also ask that you're able to swim up to 25 metres.

data.DisplayText: Many airlines also ask that you're able to swim up to 25 metres.
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: Usually you'll also be expected to:have a smart appearance; have a valid passport with no restrictions for the countries the airline travels to; live within 90 minutes of your base

Description.Html:
Usually you'll also be expected to:

  • have a smart appearance
  • have a valid passport with no restrictions for the countries the airline travels to
  • live within 90 minutes of your base

data.DisplayText: Usually you'll also be expected to:have a smart appearance; have a valid passport with no restrictions for the countries the airline travels to; live within 90 minutes of your base
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: Certain people are not allowed to stand as an MP, for example someone convicted of electoral fraud. You can check with the [Electoral Commission] for more information about this.

Description.Html: Certain people are not allowed to stand as an MP, for example someone convicted of electoral fraud. You can check with the Electoral Commission for more information about this.

data.DisplayText: Certain people are not allowed to stand as an MP, for example someone convicted of electoral fraud. You can check with the [Electoral Commission] for more information about this.
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: You'll usually need your own transport to get to and from work, as you may not be able to get public transport to suit your shift times.

Description.Html: You'll usually need your own transport to get to and from work, as you may not be able to get public transport to suit your shift times.

data.DisplayText: You'll usually need your own transport to get to and from work, as you may not be able to get public transport to suit your shift times.
data.Author: admin

TitlePart.Title: There are rules about height and weight - these vary between airlines. As a general guide, most look for people between 5ft 2in (157cm) and 6ft 2in (188cm) with weight in proportion to height.

Description.Html: There are rules about height and weight - these vary between airlines. As a general guide, most look for people between 5ft 2in (157cm) and 6ft 2in (188cm) with weight in proportion to height.

TitlePart.Title: You may need a driving licence for some jobs.
